alert.note: Alert for Lonoke (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 27 at 5:29PM CDT until April 27 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LONOKE COUNTY... At 528 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Humnoke, or 15 miles south of Lonoke, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Humnoke... Parkers Corner... Allport... Coy... Culler... Tomberlin... Seaton... Blakemore... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
